snippet.title: Goodnight Universe - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Goodnight Universe is a story-rich narrative adventure game developed by Nice Dream. Players will embody a self-aware 6-month-old baby who develops mysterious psychic abilities. Step into the perspective of a baby just trying to be loved and accepted by the family while a secretive tech corporation seeks the player out. Goodnight Universe is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#GoodnightUniverse #Gaming #Games
